img_text: Donald J. Trump @realDonaldTrump The radical left lawyers want the FBl to get involved NOW. Why didn't someone call the FBl 36 years ago? 9/21/18, 9:29 AM Daniel Dale @ddale8 This tweet is too stupid to fact-check, but the 1982 FBl did not handle assault allegations against local 17 year-olds
